usr.documentation: The time at which the last DDEATH message was received by MQTT Engine
Whether or not the Device is online. This is determined by whether the last lifecycle message was an DBIRTH or NBIRTH
The number of DDEATH messages since the last time the info metrics were reset via the Device Info/Reset Info tag
The size in bytes of the last DDATA that was received from the Device
The time at which the last DBIRTH message was received by MQTT Engine
The number of DBIRTH messages since the last time the info metrics were reset via the Device Info/Reset Info tag
The size in bytes of the last DCMD that was sent from MQTT Engine
Writable tag to 'reset' the Device Info metrics
The number of DDATA messages since the last time the info metrics were reset via the Device Info/Reset Info tag
